name: RAZAM
description:
Collect all memories and find out the story of "world with no light" and why "Stronger Together"!

This is a game about how those who did not accept and rejected others went mad in the dark. And those who accept others as they are live in unity and peace, razam.  (razam translates as together)

Game made during BrackeysGameJam (razam translates as together)

Controls:

  • Hold Space to fly;
  • WASD to move;
  • E to interact;
  • ESC to return to Menu;

Check my twitter to find out how it was developed;

The only one free asset used: Low Poly Man Model;
